author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-NuVasive Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share Of $0.53
text:
May 1 (Reuters) - NuVasive Inc:
* NUVASIVE ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $1.095 BILLION TO $1.105 BILLION * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $1.10 BILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FULL-YEAR 2018 NON-GAAP DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE IN A RANGE OF $2.44 TO $2.47
* EXPECTS CURRENCY TO HAVE A POSITIVE IMPACT IN 2018 OF APPROXIMATELY $10 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
